Key Arguments: The legislation is an attack on freedom of speech, a fundamental right.
The government lacks the objectivity and wisdom to determine truth from falsehood.
The legislation is authoritarian and reminiscent of historical and current oppressive regimes.
The bill could cause harm by censoring potentially truthful information, as illustrated by the COVID-19 lab origin debate.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right of every Australian.
A government that wants to control people through this proposed legislation can only be viewed as authoritarian in nature.
What was once called 'misinformation' is now quite possibly the truth!
